name: Speakable Programming for Every Language
short_description:
A computer programming language using human language syntax      
for human-to-human and human-to-computer communication           
with high precision, supporting many languages.                  
                                                

Currently has alpha prototype support for analytic versions of the UN languages English, Mandarin Chinese, Spanish, Arabic, Russian and French as well as a bunch of others in addition to the core mwak language. 

The alpha IDE is at 
http://spel.sourceforge.net/src/web/spel.html
(wait for it to finish loading before clicking "translate")

Since it is early prototype, it's not easy to use,
If you are interested, join the mailing list.
latest code is in the git repository.
summary: Your language to speak with all.
